signatures.name: Rob
signatures.message: Why did the math book look so sad when you left? Because it's full of problems without you to solve them! Good luck at school!

signatures.name: David
signatures.message: What's the difference between our office and your classroom? At school, you get grades for sleeping through meetings! We'll miss having you around!

signatures.name: Chris
signatures.message: Why don't scientists trust atoms in college? Because they make up everything... just like your excuses for leaving us! Best of luck with your studies!

signatures.name: Andriy
signatures.message: What did the code say when you left for school? 'I'm having a breakdown!' Don't worry, we'll try to debug without you. Study hard!

signatures.name: Steve
signatures.message: Why is our team like a broken pencil without you? Pointless! Thanks for all your hard work this summer. Go ace those classes!
